name: Orangetango
description:
Orangetango is a global communication agency, experienced in advertising, expert in design, fundamentally digital in concentrated format. Exit the big energy-consuming structures, we are LEAN by choice and for efficiency. 
Orangetango reconciles strategic thinking and power of ideas within a flexible and agile structure. Orangetango is a collective of experts, seniors in their fields, united by the desire to make remarkable gestures that advance to the rhythm of the business of its customers.
